TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
All data files containing bit coin corrupt

I wish for my cat to be alive again with no grudges and a selectively permeable force field that only I can enter and my cat follows me everywhere

You didn't mention not having the cat get run over three seconds after his return...

I wish for a completely normal cheesecake.

Granted. You also now hate cheesecake

I wish for a good gaming laptop.

Granted, but it has a crappy video card.

I wish for a good desktop PC.

Granted. This "Desktop" was good in the 1960's

I wish that I wasn't so scare of

Granted your scared of humans.

I wish that the island of sodor was real.

Granted, that is the only real place now, and it is inhabited by nihilists

I wish the skeleton movie was longer

Granted - after the credits roll, you see three hours of this:

I wish my car had moar boosters.

Granted. These things are basically controlled bombs. Do I really need to explain how this could go wrong?

I wish for a non-murderous horse that is immortal.

Granted. It is built out of dirt, has a low ceiling, and only enough room for you to stand in it. Oh, it also lacks internet connection.

CORRECTION: But it runs away, joins a racing team, and when you bet a ton of money on it it loses.

I wish that this message becomes invisible

Edited December 31, 2013 by Noname117

Granted. But since you didn't read that the above user said horse, you explode

I wish for more of

Granted, but they're not spooky anymore.

I wish for a bucket full of nutella.

Granted. It expired January 4, 2013

I wish I had pepperoni pizza.

Granted. It expired January 4, 2013

Like that's a problem.

Granted, but it comes with a lot of ingredients you don't like.

I wish the KSP devs added another planet to the game.

Granted, it quickly turns into a black hole

I wish for a computer that can run a 123154231 part ship

Granted. It can run a 1.23154231 part ship

I wish that LOG Would launch

Granted. A log was launched in your face.

I wish I get a button quail.

Those are button quails.

Granted. Button quail attacked your eye, and made it bleed.

I wish it was possible for me to go to space.

Granted, you're in space (without space suit)

I wish I could have a personal quantium computer.

Granted. It exists in your stomach, greatly restricting the choice of available inputs, while the outputs are quickly reduced to unusable by natural processes.

I wish it was warmer here.

Granted, the sun now occupies your front lawn.

I wish I was dextrous enough to play an instrument.

Granted. You learn to play the recorder, and become an expert at making it produce the most ungodly screeching sounds ever let loose by a human being. People are so enthralled by the noises it makes that they come for miles for a concert- only to leave with their ears bleeding because you missed a note mid performance.

I wish it was cooler out.

Granted, you live on Sedna... At it's apoapsis.

I wish all space agencies got an unlimited supply of money for manned interplanetary exploration purposes.

Granted, they start going through astronauts as fast as KSP agencies go through kerbals when Jeb is in charge of building the spacecraft, so fast that a draft is made for astronauts. You are picked and die in space.

I wish KSP .25 was out already in its full form.

Granted, but the servers are permanently down.

I wish I had some more sealing wax...
